Vehicle.Name: Modular Barracks
Vehicle.Description: [H3]MilBar F-221 Modular Barracks[h3] Please see page 48 of the Lead by Example Sourcebook for details. [P][I]Disclaimer: This is a piece of field equipment found in the Lead by Example Sourcebook. It is created as a stationary "vehicle" because it is the most appropriate format. While any mods or benefits are per the official source, the actual vehicle stats are an interpretation only and are not official. Feel free to modify them if you think any changes are required.[i]

Mod.MiscDesc: Sealed against chemical and biological attacks.
